About Me

Let me tell you a few things ...

BIO

I recently moved to Denver from Miami, FL in an attempt to satiate my love for the mountains and the outdoors. I am a web developer with experience in JavaScript, React, Ruby and Rails. Before transitioning careers into tech I was an Elementary School teacher to some pretty awesome kids and I hope to continue giving back to the community and the youth.

When I'm not teaching or coding you can find me cooking for friends and family, hiking, camping or doing yoga. Now, that I live in Colorado, I'm picking up rock climbing so if you need an adventure partner, look no further!
